name: Dr. Sarah Brown
description: Dr. Sarah Brown is a certified pet nutritionist who helps pet owners design balanced winter diets. She focuses on providing customized meal plans to ensure pets get enough warmth and nutrients during cold weather. Her expertise keeps pets energetic and healthy throughout the frosty season.

name: Dr. Michael Lee
description: Dr. Michael Lee is an experienced pet groomer and skin care specialist. He guides owners on maintaining soft fur and healthy skin even in dry winter conditions. His treatments include moisturizing paw balms, gentle shampoos, and protective grooming methods suitable for all breeds.

name: Dr. Anna Taylor
description: Dr. Anna Taylor is a skilled veterinary surgeon known for her expertise in paw protection and winter emergency treatments. She assists pet owners in preventing frostbite, treating minor injuries, and ensuring pets stay safe during cold outdoor activities. Her compassionate care ensures comfort and safety.
